text: For Get-It-Off-Your-Chest-Sunday (a new meme?) I don't generally comment on #metoo discussions because the few times I have resulted in some jaw-droppingly ugly put-downs. There really is no limit to how creepy women are willing to get on this topic. But imho nothing is going to change until the discussion opens up and people listen to all perspectives. People have the right to seem wrong or tone deaf to you without losing their livelihoods. There really is a McCarthy-like thing going on here.
